summary: Comprehensive testing of Fixed Income Primary Market (IPO/NFO) module. All backend APIs pass (17/17 tests). Frontend UI fully functional - page loads, Create Issue dialog, Subscribe dialog all working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: The /api/clients endpoint returns an array directly, not {clients: []}. This inconsistency may cause issues in other places - consider standardizing API response format.
Issues created with future open_date can be set to 'open' status but bids are still rejected until open_date arrives - consider adding validation when changing status to 'open'
seed_data_creation: Created multiple test issues and bids during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Primary Market IPO/NFO module fully tested and working. Backend supports full workflow: Create Issue -> Open Issue -> Submit Bid -> Confirm Payment -> Close Issue -> Process Allotment. Frontend has all dialogs and tab navigation working.

backend_api.POST /api/fixed-income/primary-market/is: PASS - Creates new issue in draft status
backend_api.GET /api/fixed-income/primary-market/iss: PASS - Lists all issues with pagination
PASS - Returns issue details with bid statistics
backend_api.GET /api/fixed-income/primary-market/act: PASS - Returns open issues within subscription window
backend_api.POST /api/fixed-income/primary-market/bi: PASS - Submits bid for open issue
backend_api.POST /api/fixed-income/primary-market/is: PASS - Processes allotment for closed issues

frontend_ui.Create Issue button and dialog: PASS - Opens modal with all form fields
frontend_ui.Subscribe button and dialog: PASS - Opens modal with client selection, quantity, payment mode
frontend_ui.Tabs navigation: PASS - Active Issues, All Issues, My Bids tabs work
frontend_ui.Summary cards: PASS - Shows Open Issues, Upcoming, Total Issues, My Bids counts
